title: Breitbart News Has Been Losing A Shit Ton Of Advertisers And Milo Yiannopoulos' Latest Controversy Isn't Helping! | PerezHilton.com

organizations.name: breitbart news has been losing a shit ton of advertisers

text:
Let the fallout begin!
As we reported , after Milo Yiannopoulos talked pedophilia in a podcast, the conservative figure lost both his speaking engagement at CPAC and his book deal .
But this isn't the end of his punishment!
Related: Milo Creates College Grant — Exclusively For White Men! 
Not only is employer Breitbart News reportedly thinking about firing him , the company is losing advertisers amid the controversy!
According to Sleeping Giants , a Twitter account/organization aimed at preventing racist websites from getting ad revenue, 1000+ businesses have blocked the right-wing publication from their media plan to date. Now, Breitbart has always been controversial, so not all of these businesses' stances are credited to Milo's current shitstorm.
That being said, the number of businesses who've blocked the site from their advertising game-plans has increased following Monday's headlines.
As seen below: 
CONFIRMED: Swimsuit experts @urLOVECULTURE have blocked Breitbart from their media buy!
— Sleeping Giants (@slpng_giants) February 20, 2017 

People are saying "fuck you" to Breitbart the best way they know how… with their wallets!
To see the entire list of businesses, CLICK HERE !
[ Image via Instagram . ] 
Tags: breitbart news , business blitz , controversy , milo yiannopoulos , twitter
